casebody.data:
James Morris FLETCHER, State Correctional Institution, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Mark G. SHULTZ, Sheriff of Waynes-burg, Pennsylvania, and Harold A. Russell, Ex-Chief Deputy Sheriff of Waynesburg, Pennsylvania. No. 19419. United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Submitted June 11, 1971. Decided June 24, 1971. *568James Morris Fletcher, pro se. Floyd A. King, Sayers, King & Keener, Waynesburg, Pa., for appellees.

Before STALEY and ADAMS, Circuit Judges, and GARTH, District Judge.

Opinion of the Court

PER CURIAM:

This appeal from the dismissal of a civil rights complaint was untimely taken. It, therefore, will be dismissed.
